meta.description: Determine 4 out of 5 workers to complete one of the four tasks, minimizing total working hours.

sets.name: WORKERS
sets.description: Set of workers available for task assignment.

sets.name: TASKS
sets.description: Set of tasks to be completed.

params.name: time
params.description: Time required for each worker to complete each task.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if a worker is assigned to a task.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(time[w][t] * x[w][t] for w in WORKERS for t in TASKS)
objective.description: Minimize the total working hours for task assignments.

constraints.name: task_assignment
constraints.description: Each task A must be assigned to exactly one worker.

constraints.name: task_assignment
constraints.description: Each task B must be assigned to exactly one worker.

constraints.name: task_assignment
constraints.description: Each task C must be assigned to exactly one worker.

constraints.name: task_assignment
constraints.description: Each task D must be assigned to exactly one worker.

constraints.name: worker_limit
constraints.description: Worker I can be assigned to at most one task.

constraints.name: worker_limit
constraints.description: Worker II can be assigned to at most one task.

constraints.name: worker_limit
constraints.description: Worker III can be assigned to at most one task.

constraints.name: worker_limit
constraints.description: Worker IV can be assigned to at most one task.

constraints.name: worker_limit
constraints.description: Worker V can be assigned to at most one task.

constraints.name: select_four_workers
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[w][t] for w in WORKERS for t in TASKS)
constraints.description: Exactly four workers must be selected to complete the tasks.
